tool_description: Ebay Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to product, price, sales rank and reviews data from Ebay in JSON format
name: Ebay Data Scraper
title: Ebay Data Scraper

api_list.name: Search products
api_list.description:
This endpoint can be used to search a products based in the name. Another feature is the possibility to navigate between the pages of results.
You must provider in each request two parameters: page_number and product_name.

The USA subdomain not need to be selected, because it is the mais domain.

**Allowed *country* params**
- australia
- austria
- canada
- france
- germany
- hong kong
- ireland
- italy
- malaysia
- netherlands
- philippines
- poland
- singapore
- spain
- switzerland
- united kingdom

api_list.name: Request API status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/status/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
